mission_text: Delivering elite tools for Android game mods
lang_updated: ✅ Language has been updated. Please type /start to reload.
start_intro: 👑 Welcome to Snake Engine ⚙️ The most powerful Android game modding platform — no root, no detection, no hassle. 🛡 Your safety is our priority: 100% safe, fully sandboxed, no risky permissions. 🌍 Trusted by over 10 million gamers worldwide. Start your journey now — choose your tool
vip_step2: 2. Tap the Shopping Cart 🛒 icon (bottom bar).
vip_step3: 3. Choose your country from the list.
vip_step4: 4. Contact one of the verified resellers.
vip_note: You’ll get the best prices and instant activation.
vip_alert: 👑 VIP Access will be available soon!
tools_tap_hint: Tap a tool below to see full features.
tool_8ball_description: 🎱 8Ball Pool – Snake Engine v2 ⚡ Take control with over 30+ smart features 🎯 Core Features • Aim lines during and after shots • Power lock & custom default power • Pocket position display • Ad & offer blocker 🎨 Visual Customization • Line width, transparency, and style • Multi-language interface ⚙️ Auto Play Modes • Pro Fast | Pro Player | Fast Mode • Break fix for illegal/failed shots 🕹 Auto Queue System • Matchmaking automation • View rival info (Level, Coins) 🧠 Smart Shot Tools • 9-ball prioritizer • Paralysis (disable opponent turns) • Golden Shot (target assist) 💰 Coin & Match Filters • Table filters (e.g. 20M+ only) • Mixed or locked table join • Coin % control ✅ No root ✅ No system file edits ✅ Safe – Works with official game Download now and dominate! 💥
security_message: 🛡️ The cheat for 8 Ball Pool is currently SAFE ✅ and stable. No detection or bans reported.
security_select_game: 🛡️ Choose a game to check its security status:
sec_8ball_status:
🎱 8 Ball Pool is currently ✅ SAFE and STABLE.
No detection or ban reported.
sec_carrom_status:
🟤 Carrom Pool is currently under review.
Security status will be updated soon.
safe_usage_guide: 🧠 How to Use Snake Engine Safely Snake Engine is built to give you powerful control, with safety in mind. To reduce risk and enjoy stable use: • Prefer using tools in training or private matches. • Competitive modes are more sensitive — use at your own risk. • Avoid showing tools in live streams or screen recordings. • Use trusted VIP resellers inside the app only. • Stay updated with the latest version of the app. ✅ Snake Engine is designed for safety — but your actions matter too.
reseller_warning:
⚠️ Warning to All Users & Customers!
🚨 Please read carefully

We've detected fake sellers and unofficial resellers claiming to represent us on the 🐍 "Snake Engine" platform.
‼️ They are NOT part of our official team.

✅ To stay safe:
Always make sure you're dealing with our only verified supplier whose name appears inside the app.

❌ Do NOT trust any names or sellers claiming affiliation outside the app.

🛡️ Your safety matters to us.
If you face any issue with the official supplier, contact us — we’re here to help! 🙏
reseller_terms:
📋 Official Supplier Terms on the Snake Engine Platform:

1. ❗ Suppliers are strictly forbidden from collaborating with or selling on any competing platforms.
2. 📣 Each supplier must have strong support — such as an active Telegram channel or trusted reseller network.
3. 📱 Basic knowledge of Android applications is required.
4. 💵 A $500 one-time registration fee is required to activate supplier access in the app.
5. 📋 Once approved, the supplier will be listed in the official supplier directory inside the app.
6. ✅ The supplier can then sell directly to users, stores, or their own network.
7. 💰 Once the $500 fee is paid, it will be credited to your wallet inside the app, and you can use it to activate clients.
reseller_full_message: 📋 Official Supplier Terms: 1. ❗ Suppliers are strictly forbidden from collaborating with or selling on any competing platforms outside Snake Engine. 2. 📣 Each supplier must have strong support — such as an active Telegram channel or a trusted reseller network. 3. 📱 Basic knowledge of Android applications is required. 4. 💵 A one-time registration fee of $500 USD is required to activate the supplier account inside the app. 5. 📋 Once approved, the supplier’s name will appear in the official supplier list inside the app. 6. ✅ The supplier can then sell directly to users, stores, or private networks. 7. 💰 After paying the $500, the amount will be added directly to your wallet inside the app and can be used to activate clients.
email_instructions: 📧 Official Email: syspeek.dev@gmail.com Copy it and send using any email app on your phone.
email_instruction_line: Copy the email above and send from any email app you use (like Gmail, Outlook, or Apple Mail).
email_note: We are available to answer all inquiries from official resellers.
about_text: 🐍 Snake Engine is a powerful game assistant for Android devices. 🔹 Supported Versions: Android 9 to 15 (64-bit) 🔹 Main Features: Game tools, VIP access, reseller support, and more. 🔹 Security: 100% Safe and regularly tested. 🔹 Updates: Constant updates for new games and features. 💡 Developed with ❤️ by Snake Engine Team.
deviceinfo_text: 📲 Download the Device Info Tool to check your device details:

gpt_error: ⚠️ An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

💬 To ask a question, type:
/ask your question here
help_app_1_text: Please reinstall the app or check your internet conn.
help_app_2_text: Make sure your phone is not overloaded. Close background apps.
help_game_1_text: Ensure the game is installed and compatible with your device.
help_game_2_text: Try clearing the game's data or reinstalling it.
help_payment_1_text: You can subscribe via the VIP section inside the app.
help_payment_2_text: If your subscription isn't working, contact us or your supplier.
help_supplier_1_text: Open the VIP section in the app to find official suppliers.
help_supplier_2_text: Only deal with official suppliers. Report any suspicious activity.
help_errors_1_text: Update to the latest version of the app and restart your phone.
help_errors_2_text: Send us a report via /contact if you see any unknown issues.
help_select_app_issue: Choose a problem related to the app:
help_issue_app_not_open_text: 📴 The app won't open Make sure your phone is connected to the internet and has a stable network. Also, verify your device uses a 64-bit processor and supports Android 9 to 15.
help_issue_app_slow_text: 🐢 The app is slow This issue is likely due to your phone's performance. Snake Engine is stable and optimized — try using a more powerful device for best results.
help_issue_menu_not_showing_text: Menu not showing If the tool menu does not appear in the app, please contact the reseller who activated your subscription. They will report the issue and help fix it immediately.
help_select_game_issue: Choose a problem related to the game:
help_issue_game_not_working_text: 🎮 The game is not working There may be several reasons: • Ensure your device supports the game (Android 9 to 15, 64-bit). • Restart your phone and reinstall the Snake Engine app. • Still having issues? Contact the reseller who activated your subscription.
help_issue_game_crash_text: 💥 The game crashes 1. ❌ If the app crashes on start: your device might not be compatible (must be 64-bit, Android 9–15). 2. 📲 If the crash happens inside the app or when opening the menu: reinstall the app and ensure compatibility. 3. 🛠️ Still having trouble? Contact your reseller for help.
help_select_subscription_issue: Choose a subscription or payment issue:
help_issue_payment_not_received_text: 💸 Payment not received If you paid but VIP is not active: • Contact the reseller you paid to with a screenshot of the payment. • They will confirm and activate your subscription. • If unresolved, forward the issue to official support.
help_issue_vip_not_working_text: ❌ VIP not working • Make sure you are logged in to the correct device. • Open the app and tap the Shopping Cart 🛒 to verify VIP status. • If it still doesn't work, contact the reseller or support.
help_issue_subscription_not_active_text: 📭 Subscription not active Make sure you entered the correct account and restarted the app. If you still don't see activation, contact the supplier who sold you the service to confirm activation.
help_issue_payment_failed_text: 💸 Payment failed If your payment failed, please verify that your payment method is supported and try again. If the issue persists, contact the supplier or use a different method.
help_issue_fake_reseller_text: 🚨 Fake reseller alert Please only buy from official suppliers listed inside the app. If you bought from someone not listed, we cannot guarantee support or activation.
help_select_reseller_issue: Choose the issue you're facing with the reseller:
help_issue_reseller_not_responding_text: If your reseller is not responding, please wait a few hours. If the delay continues, contact us with proof of payment and we will follow up.
help_issue_reseller_fake_text: If you believe the reseller is fake or not listed, stop dealing with them immediately and report it to us. Only official resellers listed in the app are approved.
help_select_error_issue: Select the type of error you're facing:
help_issue_error_code_text: 🔴 If you're seeing an error code, please take a screenshot and send it to your reseller. We'll help resolve it as soon as possible.
help_issue_unexpected_behavior_text: ⚠️ If the app is behaving unexpectedly or crashing at unusual steps, try reinstalling it and make sure your device supports 64-bit Android 9 to 15. If the issue continues, contact your reseller.
help_intro: 🔍 Hi there! How can I help you? Please select the issue you're facing:

device_check_message: 🧠 Check Your Device Compatibility with Snake Engine 🔍 This app only works on devices with 64-bit system (arm64-v8a) ✅. 🚫 Devices with 32-bit system (armeabi-v7a) are not supported ❌. 📲 Steps to Check: 1. Download this small tool: 🔗 Device Info Tool 2. After installation, open the app and check for: ABI: arm64-v8a ✅ = Supported ✔️ ABI: armeabi-v7a ❌ = Not Supported ❌ 📌 Note: If your device is only 32-bit, the app will unfortunately not run.

reseller_email_instructions: Click one of the buttons below to open your email app:
reseller_email_copy: 📩 Or copy this address and send your request from your email app:
reseller_terms_body: 1️⃣ Prohibited to work with any competing apps/platforms outside Snake Engine 🚫 2️⃣ You must have an active & trusted communication channel for client support 📢 3️⃣ Basic knowledge of Android apps is required 📱 4️⃣ Initial registration fee of $500 USD to activate your reseller account 💳 5️⃣ Once activated, your name appears in the official resellers list in the app 🏆 6️⃣ Direct selling to users only — no intermediaries or networks 😌 7️⃣ After the first payment, you may use your in-app balance to activate clients 💼
reseller_warning_body: If you contact the developer without agreeing to the terms, you will be ignored and permanently blocked from messaging 🚷.
mailto_open_hint: Tap the link below to open your device’s default mail app:
mailto_tip: Tip: you can copy the email and use any mail client you prefer.
reseller_terms_warning: ⚠️ Important: If you contact us without accepting these terms, your messages may be ignored and you may be blocked.
reseller_terms_points:
1. Suppliers must not deal with any competing apps/sites outside Snake Engine.
2. You must have an active support channel (Telegram channel/group).
3. You must have Android system experience (basic troubleshooting and security).
4. Pay a $500 fee to activate the supplier account inside the app.
5. This $500 is added to your wallet to activate keys/IDs inside the app to protect users' rights.
6. Sales should be through official channels; any external sales are your full responsibility.
tap_to_open_mail_app: Tap to open your mail app with a pre-filled message:
copy_and_use_email: Or copy the email and send manually.
email_body_template: Hello, I'd like to apply as a supplier. Please provide the next steps.
apply_intro: To apply as a supplier, please answer a few quick questions.
apply_submitted: ✅ Your application has been submitted and is pending review.
apply_already_pending: You already have a pending application. Please wait for review.
ask_name: Your full name (as it will appear to customers)?
retry_channel: Please send a valid Telegram link or @username.
ask_experience: Briefly describe your Android system experience.
approve_message:
✅ Your supplier application has been approved.
Next step: Pay $500 to activate your account. Once paid, $500 will be credited to your wallet for key/ID activations.
admin_ask_prompt: Send your question to the applicant:
apply_blocked: You were recently rejected. You can re-apply after {days} day(s) (after: {until}).
admin_unbanned_user: ✅ Your block has been lifted. You can apply again now.
pitch: ⚙️ Powerful Android mod platform — no root, no bans.
safety: 🛡️ Safety first: protective features, isolated sandbox, no risky tools.
supplier_pay_body: Next step: please pay $500 to activate your supplier account. This amount will be added to your wallet for future activations/keys.
supplier_pay_binance_note: After payment, tap “I’ve paid”. The developer will contact you to finalize your supplier onboarding.
paid_ack_user: ✅ We received your payment notice. The developer will contact you shortly.
admin_verified_ok: User has been upgraded to Supplier.
pay_confirm_user: ✅ Payment confirmed. You've been added as a supplier. For any help, contact the developer at {dev}.
pay_reject_user: ⛔ We couldn't find your payment. Please contact the developer at {dev} or send a payment receipt here.
pay_contact_user: 🗨️ The developer will contact you shortly. You may also message {dev}.
pay_ask_receipt_user: 🧾 Please upload your payment receipt (as a photo or file) here so we can verify it.
pay_ask_receipt_admin: 🧾 Asked the user for a payment receipt.
admin_reload_not_supported: Reload is not supported in this build.
supplier_paid_ack: Thanks! We've notified the developer. You'll be upgraded after manual verification.
supplier_verify_ok_user: ✅ Payment verified. You're now a supplier. The developer {dev} will contact you to finalize access. Use /start to see supplier tools.
supplier_verify_reject_user: ⛔ We couldn't verify your payment. If you already paid, please send the receipt or contact {dev}.
supplier_verify_askreceipt_user: Please send the payment receipt (screenshot or TxID).
supplier_verify_contact_info: You can contact the user directly.
pay_intro: Please pay the supplier activation fee of ${amount} via Binance. Binance ID: {binance}.
pay_after_note: When finished, press the button below to notify the developer.
supplier_demoted_user: Your supplier status has been removed. You are now a regular user. Use /start to refresh your menu.
sk_hint: Tap a key below to toggle status or delete.
sk_add_hint: Send keys (one per line). I will ignore duplicates.
app.caption.title: 📦 Snake Engine App File
app.only_admin: This command is for admins only.
app.reply_with_apk: Upload an APK with a caption starting with /set_app <version> (e.g., /set_app v1.2 notes), or reply to a message that contains an APK with the same command.
app.not_apk: This is not an APK file. Please upload a .apk file.
app.updated_ok: ✅ App file updated successfully. Users can download it now.
app.removed_ok: 🗑️ The current release has been removed. Download is disabled.
app.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the current release? Users won't be able to download after this.
admin.app.title: App File Management
admin.app.help:
To upload/update the app:
1) Send the APK as a Document.
2) Either set the caption to: /set_app v1.2 notes
   or reply to the APK message with the same command.
Then users can download it from the button.

vip.utils.title: VIP Utilities
vip.utils.fix_perms_text:
Follow these steps:
1) Reboot the phone.
2) Clear the app cache.
3) Ensure required permissions.
4) Sign out then sign in.
vip.utils.block_updates_text: Play Store > Profile > Settings > Network preferences > Auto-update apps > ‘Don’t auto-update’.
vip.utils.device_diag_text:
Quick checklist:
• System updated?
• Enough storage?
• Google/Play services enabled?
• Stable internet?
• No VPN/Firewall blocking?

liveadm.title: 🛠️ Live Chat Admin Panel
liveadm.help:
• This panel lets you manage live chat.
• Use buttons to manage sessions & blocklist.
• You can also: /block UID duration  (e.g. /block 123 1d)
• And /unblock UID

reseller.terms.title: 🧾 Official Supplier Terms
reseller.terms.warning: ⚠️ Important: Contacting us without accepting these terms may result in your message being ignored and your account blocked.
reseller.terms.rule1: 1) Suppliers are prohibited from dealing with competing apps or websites outside Snake Engine.
reseller.terms.rule2: 2) You must have an active support channel (Telegram channel/group).
reseller.terms.rule3: 3) You must be familiar with the subscription flow (activate/disable) and maintain sufficient stock.
reseller.terms.rule4: 4) The monthly fee for a supplier account inside the app is $500.
reseller.terms.rule5: 5) You are legally responsible for keeping sales and subscription records for your customers.
reseller.terms.rule6: 6) Dealings must go through official channels only; any external sales are at your own risk.
admin_hub_reports_hint: Use the buttons to navigate between Inbox / Settings / Banned.
notify.banned_temp: ⛔ Your report feature is restricted for {time}.
notify.banned_perm: ⛔ Your report feature has been permanently restricted. If this is a mistake, please contact support.
notify.unbanned: ✅ The restriction has been lifted. You can use /report now.
notify.cooldown_cleared: 🧹 Your cooldown has been cleared. You can open a new report now.
notify.chat_closed: 🔒 Your support chat has been closed. You can open a new report via /report when needed.
notify.chat_reopened: ♻️ Your support chat has been reopened. You can send a message now.
alerts.menu.title: Update Alerts
alerts.enter_text: Send me the alert text (supports Markdown).
alerts.ask_when: Send the time for scheduling (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM).
alerts.quiet_wait: Inside quiet hours; will wait until allowed.
alerts.settings.ask_max_per_week: Send new max sends per week (integer).
alerts.ask_ttl: Enter message TTL in seconds (0 = do not auto-delete). e.g. 60
alerts.invalid_seconds: Invalid value. Send a number between 0 and 86400.
